enigma_edit.lua.data

Interface Resolver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Source, Typed
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Autotile, Composer, Custom, MMResolver, Tiles

    public interface Resolver
extends Source
    Interface of a resolver. A resolver is used to compute a tile declaration from a string in the world map. To enable editing, we also require the reverse process of determining the key string from a given tile declaration.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Resolver.Constructor
      Resolver constructor interface.

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        TileDecl resolve(java.lang.String key,
                 Mode2 mode)
        Resolve the given key to a tile declaration.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to resolve.
        mode - Difficulty mode to use.
        Returns:
        A tile declaration corresponding to the requested tile.

      • reverse

        java.lang.String reverse(TileDecl tile,
                         Mode2 mode)
        Return a key, that would be resolved to the given tile declaration. This might return null, if no such tile can be constructed by the resolvers with the current tile repository.
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to determine the key for.
        mode - Difficulty mode to use.
        Returns:
        A key string to be used in the map.

      • getTiles

        Tiles getTiles(Mode2 mode)
        Get the tile repository used by this resolver. This method might return null, if the final resolver is a custom resolver function.
        Parameters:
        mode - Difficulty mode to use.
        Returns:
        Tile repository used by this resolver.
